channel.title: Making reset NPC
channel.description:
Hee guys,
I'm making a server based on Eclipse. I want to make a NPC which can reset your stats and can shoud: To reset stats, talk with me.
I hope you guys can help me out.
Greetz, NDW
(oyea is it possible to make mounts like on WoW on a private rs?)

item.title: Making reset NPC
item.dc:creator: @NDW NDW
item.description:
@NDW wrote:

Thanx,
but how can i change my client, so i can make mounts?And do you perhaps know how to making a NPC which can reset stats? cause i had some problems with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Making reset NPC
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

If there are no mounts in the revision of the Runescape client you’re writing your server for than no, mounts cannot be added without editing the client.

Read full topic
